long_description: The REI Lunch Bag will help keep your meal cool and fresh while you're at work or on a picnic. Closed-cell foam layer provides efficient insulation to keep food and beverages cool; it also protects fruit from bruising. Heavy-duty PEVA liner is waterproof and PVC-free; liner wipes clean quickly and easily. A secure roll-top closure helps contents stay fresh and doubles as a handle. REI Lunch Bag has an outer pocket with rip-and-stick closure that gives you a place to stow a napkin and utensils.
short_description: The REI Lunch Bag will help keep your meal cool and fresh while you're at work or on a picnic.
